name: Deadbot
description:
Not quite finished, oh well. Ran out of time to add some features I wanted and to add any audio...

Was a fun jam though.

---

Look with mouse, move with WASD (standard stuff)

You will have 10 minutes to find the one robot that "is not real", as it is an evil smelly human in disguise.

The human will murder your fellow robot friends and will mess with the environment.

When you think you figured out who the human is, click your suspect. You have 5 attempts.

Look around and use your cameras to find the killer within the time limit to win!

Press Enter to begin

P to restart

ESC to close the game

--------

List of assets used:

  • https://3dtextures.me/2021/07/12/concrete-017/
  • https://3dtextures.me/2021/12/10/metal-scratched-009/
  • https://3dtextures.me/2019/10/07/marble-tiles-001/
  • https://www.dafont.com/symtext.font
